name: Red Edge Dispeller (prototype)
description:
THE GAME

Red Edge Dispeller is a simple 2D platformer game made with Unity 2D. This is still under development.

IN SUMMARY

Red Hood And Claw are free adventurers. And today too, They receive someone's request.

CREDITS

DCD3B2

The sound material by PANICPUMPKIN, Wingless Seraph
